name: Eco Sensor 100
description: A compact, entry-level environmental sensor used for monitoring temperature, humidity, and particulate concentration in small indoor environments.

name: Air Quality Pro
description: High-accuracy air quality station capable of measuring CO₂, PM2.5, PM10, VOCs, and atmospheric pressure. Designed for laboratories and industrial use.

name: Aqua Monitor Lite
description: Portable water-quality analyzer used to measure pH, turbidity, dissolved oxygen, and salinity in field conditions.

name: Climate Node X
description: Advanced climate station for long-term environmental measurement, featuring modular sensor attachments and 3D visualization support.

name: Geo Scan 3D
description: A rugged 3D environmental scanner designed for terrain mapping, structural inspections, and industrial measurements.
